title: What are the lyrics of the Malang song? - Quora

response.answer_text: Malang Title Track Lyrics | Rahoon Main Malang Lyrics 2020  Malang Title Track Lyrics | Rahoon Main Malang Lyrics 2020 Malang Title Track Lyrics (2020) :- After releasing the love song Chal Ghar Chalen the makers of Aditya Roy Kapoor and Disha Patani starrer movie Malang ready to release another track which is titled Malang in the voice of very gifted artist Ved Sharma and music also given by Ved Sharma himself while this beautiful title song Malang Lyrics are penned by Kunaal Verma and Harsh Limbachiya. This song is presented by T-Series label.
